Summary: Much larger then any light should be, Did not belong there. very familiar with area. Round.
trends: There have been 11 other sightings in Muskegon
There were no other sightings in Muskegon on or around August 15th 1997
divs: Sighting Detailsdriving home, after 2nd shift, i saw very large light hovering over or near Muskegon michigan. I have driven that stretch 3000 times and that object did not belong there, too big and bright for a star. I pulled over and got out to look, and total time i saw it was maybe 3 minutes. Then it shot out of sight into outerspace, incredible acceleration, no human body could survive that. I saw it go right out of our atmosphere, directly, no vectoring for escape trajectory that our craft need.
